articles.title: International Film & TV Unions React To WGA Strike - Deadline
articles.description: UPDATE, 1.18am, May 3: The Australian and Canadian film and TV unions have joined the UK’s writers’ guild in telling their writers to down tools on U.S. shows during the strike. Interna…
articles.content:
UPDATE, 1.18am, May 3: The Australian and Canadian film and TV unions have joined the UK’s writers’ guild in telling their writers to down tools on U.S. shows during the strike.
